features.1: Added random number generator for Lot ID
features.2: Embedded reader setup form rather than a popup.
features.3: Added a dialog to the software update dialog to restart the computer.
features.4: Added identifier to title of reader grid with Lot ID.

bugfixes.1: Added support for new hubs by limiting usage to USB2.
bugfixes.2: Added touchscreen scrolling support for release notes dialog
